alert.note: Alert for Brown (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 09 at 11:14AM CDT until April 15 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Cottonwood River Above Springfield affecting Brown County. Cottonwood River at New Ulm affecting Brown County. Minnesota River At Morton affecting Redwood and Renville Counties. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota... South Fork Crow River below Mayer affecting Carver County. .River rises from melting snow will result in minor flooding. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO LATE SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cottonwood River Above Springfield. * WHEN...From late tonight to late Saturday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1030 AM CDT Sunday, the stage was 15.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 25.5 feet early Wednesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 25.7 feet on 06/19/2014. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
